main event: A youth reported seeing one oval, golf ball-sized unidentified object with a white light circling it in Hanover and Mc Sherrystown, Pennsylvania, observed for 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed by two witnesses from different vantage points,The object remained stationary during the observation period,The report concluded with a note of unidentified aircraft circling the object,The observation took place at night under scattered clouds,No physical evidence was found from the sighting.
witness description: Youth who reported the sighting and verified by local radio announcer.
